channel.title: Unlock Prayers
channel.description:
Hey guys, back at ya with needing some help. Basically i want to restrict the ability to use a certain prayer if the player has a certain killcount. EG) you can only use smite if you have 50 kills. I already have "+kills+" implemented, but can someone provide a basic structure of code of how i would implement it in clickingbuttons.java. Thanks
EDIT: FIXED [img]http://s28.postimg.org/fnbh29b4d/Untitled.png[/img]
